title: Time Stopper ~Being Naughty With You~
alternative_title: Toki wo Tomete Kimi ni Ikenai Koto ; 時を止めて、君に、イケナイコト。
status: Toki wo Tomete Kimi ni Ikenai Koto ; 時を止めて、君に、イケナイコト。
description:
Description :
        Girl has the power to stop time after falling down the stairs uses it to peep on the guy she likes while he's changing and somehow manages to push him down and gets discovered. The delinquent who always teases her and uses her as a golfer to keep her power a secret even though realistically she would already be thought of as a peeping tom by other guys so that doesn't even matter.Isn’t it normal for a girl to do perverted things after time has been stopped? Even though I can stop time, I still can’t gain my composure in front of the person I like.
